title: bAla gOpalakrishNa
sahitya:
bAla gOpAlakrSNa dorepada bhakti dEni kArE harE shrI

anupallavi

 bAluhoyye moko pAlikA menati ElA tEla meni jAlukA karasu

caraNam 1

 khajarAT pAlana karedEvEni dore nijamu kaLAnAstO 
ujeguTTu kusumsArAgnimu poDi sijuvAT jiyotinnu sailErih yEsinA
 
caraNam 2

 mAyi bApu guruvu daivumewni mannum havTili rih-yes 
kAyi sangu more kaSTugun toka kalAnAstto jiyesi shrIhari hari
 
caraNam 3

 lektO bovi more shakti jalli dore bhakti dE nenati 
yeko bhaktiyeti mukti vATujallan shakti phunnAmeni yukti karesiji
 
caraNam 4

 rAmacandra purimurih ye rAma svAmi tumeni jalli 
kAmitArthumokaji kapaTai menati rAmadAsu hOr vataya nIh-nA
